content.rendered:
Permanent Residential Facilities

Lifelong living areas of the Ashram

Gurus Kutirs Area ♦ Sant Nivas ♦ Sacred Fire Place ♦ Gurus sacred kitchen & dining area ♦ Sadhakas Nivas ♦ Bhojanshala

Gurus Kutirs Area

(Area for Pujya Guruji, God-realized Gurus, and Saints)

Holy Kutir of Pujya Guruji
(The private entity of a place to serve for highest spiritual needs)
The main resident or nivaas sthan of Pujaya Guruji

Kutirs of God-realized Gurus
(Regarded as having great knowledge, wisdom and authority)

Sant Nivas

(Residence of all Saints)
Hindu Saints identified by the terms of Sant, Mahatma or Swami

Sacred Fire Place

(Sacred Fire means Agni, the fire god)
Occasions of Hindu religious practice of Sacred Fire

Gurus Sacred Kitchen & Dining Area

(Only for Pujya Guruji, God-realized Gurus and Saints)
Sacred place to serve foods to Pujya Guruji, God-realized Gurus and Saints

Sadhakas Nivas

(Facilities for all spiritual aspirants interested in spiritual life)
All sadhakas and self-dependent persons passing their days in Sadhana and Seva

Bhojanshala

Sacred place where food and snacks are served to all Sadhakas and Seekers (visitors)
